SEARCH
Package algorithms.imageProcessing.scaleSpace

Class NextContour

java.lang.Object
algorithms.imageProcessing.scaleSpace.NextContour
public class NextContour extends Object
A class to serve the purpose of an adjacency matrix (via rules to choose the "neighbor contour") and the state of "un-visited" for the A* search algorithm.
Author:
nichole

  • Field Details

    • origContours

      protected final TreeSet<CurvatureScaleSpaceContour> origContours
      a list of closed contours extracted from a digital image

    • remainingContours

      protected final TreeSet<CurvatureScaleSpaceContour> remainingContours
      A list of indexes to origContours carrying contours from the curve, that is, closed curve edge, given to the contour matcher. Note that the lists are ordered by descending peak sigma. Note also that the List indexes are referred to as contour indexes.

    • matchedContours1

      protected final List<CurvatureScaleSpaceContour> matchedContours1

    • findTallestContourWithinScaleSpace

      public CurvatureScaleSpaceContour findTallestContourWithinScaleSpace()
      find the largest sigma peak within the remaining un-searched contours. Note that the method has the side-effect of removing the returned contour from the look-up data structures.
      Returns:

    • findTheNextSmallestUnvisitedSibling

      public CurvatureScaleSpaceContour findTheNextSmallestUnvisitedSibling(CurvatureScaleSpaceContour target)
      find the next smallest sigma peak out of all contours. Note that this method has the side effect of removing the returned contour from the internal look-up data structures.
      Parameters:
      target - the contour or which to find the next smallest contour
      Returns:
